code: import api from'./api';export const mentorsService={getEmployees:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/mentors/employees');return response.data;},getEmployeeGoals:async employeeId=>{const response=await api.get("/mentors/employees/".concat(employeeId,"/goals"));return response.data;},approveGoal:async(goalId,data)=>{await api.put("/mentors/goals/".concat(goalId,"/approve"),data);}};
